trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" /> 控件的控件数组。

trans-unit.source: The `DirListBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `DirListBox` array.
trans-unit.target: `DirListBoxArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`DirListBox`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定控件是否是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray" /> 的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 是控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`启动拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用`GiveFeedback`事件，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`事件发生时添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局子控件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 布局事件，可以通过使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 一个典型用途`MouseHover`是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`定义和检测到门户中的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `QueryContinueDrag` event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 在调整控件大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数<xref:System.EventArgs>数据到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>并获取其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性单独)。

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理自定义布局，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Layout>事件而不是`Resize`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Layout>在响应中引发事件`Resize`事件，但还会在响应其他影响控件的布局更改。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 在控件完成验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件：

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用鼠标或通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦点事件按下列顺序发生：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`false`、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件将被抑制。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>设置为`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating>事件委托中，通常会发生后的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBoxArray.Validating>事件将被抑制。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
